id: realstrategy--2022-08-07--Man smashes woman’s windshield with dumbbell during road rage incident in Houston
title: Man smashes woman’s windshield with dumbbell during road rage incident in Houston
content:
A man was caught on video smashing a woman ’ s windshield with a dumbbell following a road rage incident in Houston .
Houston police are investigating the apparent case of road rage that happened near Tidwell and the Hardy Toll Road on Sunday .
A female driver , who wishes to remain anonymous , says she was stopped at the intersection of Irvington and Tidwell near Sam Houston High School when she was rear-ended by a fast-moving vehicle .
The woman says the man in the SUV that hit her made a motion , which she took to mean @ @ @ @ @ @ @ information .
She claims she pulled over and watched as the other driver turned around and drove in the opposite direction .
She further claims she then followed the vehicle to get his license plate .
The SUV eventually pulled over on a street near Veteran ’ s Memorial Park .
The woman says no words or gestures were exchanged before the driver got out of the SUV and kicked in her headlight .
As he returned to his vehicle , she pulled out her cell phone , and said he then came @ @ @ @ @ @ @ what ensued next .
The man is seen exiting from the driver-side door of his SUV , opening the back door and retrieving what appears to be a dumbbell , which he then hurled at her windshield .
Almost a week has passed since the incident and the suspect still remains at large at this time .
author: Real Strategy

id: realstrategy--2022-08-28--Bullets fly as victims fight back carjacking suspects in Upper Manhattan
title: Bullets fly as victims fight back carjacking suspects in Upper Manhattan
content:
Video released by the NYPD Friday shows two victims fighting back against three armed thieves who attempted to carjack them in Upper Manhattan on Wednesday .
At around 9pm , three individuals carrying black handguns with laser attachments approached a driver and a passenger inside a black Honda CRV outside 516 West 159th St. and forcibly removed them from their vehicle .
The driver refused , and a fight ensued .
Then the passenger took out a handgun and began firing at the suspects .
According to the police , the driver and one of the thieves were battling while @ @ @ @ @ @ @ able to take the suspect ’ s gun away , and the suspect and his gang took off in different directions .
Police reported that the driver and passenger re-entered the CRV and also left the area .
When they arrived , officers found a 33-year-old onlooker who had a graze wound to his forehead .
The victim was taken to NYC Health + Hospitals/Bellevue by EMS , where he received treatment and was later released .
Anyone with information about this incident is asked to call the NYPD ’ s Crime Stoppers @ @ @ @
author: Real Strategy

title: 3 teenagers shot near Michele Clark High School in South Austin

Three teenagers were injured , two seriously , following a shooting Friday afternoon near Michele Clark High School on Chicago @ @ @ @ @ The shooting took place at around 2:30pm in the 400 block of South Laramie , @ @ @ @ @ high school .
According to Chicago police , three males were shot while they were @ @ @ @ @ near the sidewalk .
A 17-year-old was shot multiple times and was taken to the @ @ @ @ @ Authorities reported that a second 17-year-old was shot in the ankle and sent to the @ @ @ @ @ A third victim , a 19-year-old male , was hospitalized in good condition after suffering @ @ @ @ @ and arm .
As of Friday evening , no one has been arrested .

id: realstrategy--2022-08-28--Ohio kidnapping suspect tries to stab police officer with pen
title: Ohio kidnapping suspect tries to stab police officer with pen
content:
XENIA , Ohio — A man accused of attempting to kidnap a child from a Xenia school was caught on video trying to stab a police officer with a pen .
According to Xenia Police , Reid Duran , 35 , walked into the St. Brigid School in Xenia during an Open House event on Monday , claiming to be the parent of one of the kids there .
Duran raised suspicion among staff and parents , prompting them to call the police .
Police first spoke with Duran at St. Brigid School , where police said he admitted to @ @ @ @ @ @ @ ’ s open house to kidnap a 5-year-old female student .
Duran agreed to go back to the Justice Center for further questioning .
Court documents read , “ Since Duran was here voluntarily , and was not in custody , he was not handcuffed.
” In police footage , Duran can be seen seated in the interview room .
Duran is further seen reaching for a pen with his left hand , pausing to look at it , and then lunging towards the officer seated behind him .
The attacker is quickly @ @ @ @ @ @ @ court papers as Officer Nicholas Peters , who drags him to the ground and handcuffs him .
According to Officer Peters ’ police report , Reid “ attempted to stab me in my upper right chest/neck area .
I immediately took Reid to the ground.
” Duran made “ concerning comments ” during the investigation , according to Xenia Police , including confessing that he was there to kidnap one of the kids .
Duran further attempted to escape the room after the interrogation , which required authorities to physically detain him once @ @ @ @ @ @ @ at the jail in Greene County .
On Tuesday , August 23 , Duran was accused of attempted kidnapping , felonious assault and escape .
He is still being held without bond at the Greene County Jail .
author: Real Strategy

id: realstrategy--2022-08-28--Man points gun at woman following road rage on Texas highway
title: Man points gun at woman following road rage on Texas highway
content:
San Antonio Police is searching for a man who they say pointed a gun at a 55-year-old woman after she accidentally cut him off while driving on a highway in Texas .
According to a news release , the incident unfolded last month on July 14 .
A woman entered Interstate 10 , headed eastbound , when she accidentally cut off the suspect ’ s vehicle as she merged onto the highway just before approaching Interstate 37 , police said .
From there , the suspect began driving erratically while also exhibiting clear signs of road rage .
Once traffic @ @ @ @ @ @ @ got out of his car and approached the woman ’ s vehicle .
Video of the incident then shows him pull out a gun before aiming it at the 55-year-old victim .
San Antonio Police reports that the man then returned to his car and immediately fled the scene .
Once located , authorities are prepared to bring forth an aggravated assault charge , and further plan charging him with aggravated assault with a deadly weapon .
San Antonio Crime Stoppers is offering a reward of up to $ 5,000 for any information @ @ @ @ @ @ @
author: Real Strategy
